_header: To read strange news desires many
_description: Sixteenth-century envoy to Piers Plowman (1459) — one stanza rhyme royal

CamGon201.Transcription:
To read strange newes desires manyWhiche at my hand they cannot
                    haveffor here is but antiquitieEven like as thold booke gaveTake
                    in good part & not depraveThe plowmans rede gentle readerLo this
                    is all that I requyar
